Verses: 1 ekoodh Maranamadaindhapinbu Isravel Puththirar Thirumbak Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhuvandhaargal.

2 aagaiyaal Karththar Avargalai Aadhsoril Aalugira Yaabeen Ennum Kaanaaniyarudaiya Raajaavin Kaiyile Vitruppottaar; Avanudaiya Senaapadhikku Sicheraa Endru Per; Avan Purajaadhigaludaiya Pattanamaagiya Aroseththile Kudiyirundhaan.
3 avanukkuth Tholaayiram Iruppu Radhangal Irundhadhu; Avan Isravel Puththirarai Irubadhu Varusham Kodumaiyaai Odukkinaan; Isravel Puththirar Karththarainokki Muraiyittaargal.
4 akkaalaththile Lapidhoththin Manaiviyaagiya Theboraal Ennum Theerkkadharisiyaanaval Isravelai Nyaayam Visaariththaal.

5 aval Eppiraayeem Malaiththesamaana Raamaavukkum Beththelukkum Naduvilirukkira Theboraalin Pereechchamaraththinkeezhe Kudiyirundhaal; Ange Isravel Puththirar Avalidaththirku Nyaayavisaaranaikkup Povaargal.

6 aval Napthaliyilulla Kedhesilirukkira Apinogaamin Kumaaran Paaraakkai Varavazhaiththu: Nee Napthali Puththirarilum, Sebulon Puththirarilum Padhinaayiram Peraik Koottikkondu Thaabor Malaikkup Pogakkadavaai Endrum,

7 naan Yaabeenin Senaapadhiyaagiya Siseraavaiyum, Avan Radhangalaiyum, Avan Senaiyaiyum, Keeson Pallaththaakkile Unnidaththirku Vara Izhuththu, Avanai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen Endrum, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kattalaiyidavillaiyaa Endraal.
8 adharkup Paaraag; Nee Ennodekooda Vandhaal Poven; Ennode Koodavaraavittaal, Naan Pogamaatten Endraan.

9 adharku Aval: Naan Unnodekooda Nichchayamaai Varuven; Aanaalum Nee Pogira Prayaanaththil Undaagira Menmai Unakkuk Kidaiyaadhu; Karththar Siseraavai Oru Sthreeyin Kaiyil Oppukkoduppaar Endru Solli, Theboraal Ezhumbi, Paaraakkodekoodak Kedhesukkup Ponaal.
10 appozhudhu Paaraag: Sebulon Manusharaiyum Napthali Manusharaiyum Kedhesukku Varavazhaiththu, Thannaip Pinsellum Padhinaayiram Perode Ponaan; Theboraalum Avanodekoodap Ponaal.

11 keniyanaana Eper Enbavan Moseyin Maamanaagiya Obaabin Puththiraraayirukkira Keniyarai Vittuppirindhu, Kedhesin Kitta Irukkira Saanaayim Ennum Karvaalimarangal Aruge Than Koodaaraththaip Pottirundhaan.
12 apinogaamin Kumaaran Paaraak Thaabor Malaiyil Eripponaan Endru Siseraavukku Arivikkappattapodhu,

13 siseraa Tholaayiram Iruppuradhangalaagiya Thannudaiya Ellaaradhangalaiyum, Thannodirukkum Ellaa Janangalaiyum, Purajaadhigalin Pattanamaagiya Aroseththilirundhu Keeson Pallaththaakkile Varavazhaiththaan.

14 appozhudhu Theboraal Paaraakkai Nokki: Ezhundhupo; Karththar Siseraavai Un Kaiyil Oppukkodukkum Naal Idhuve; Karththar Unakku Munbaagap Purappadavillaiyaa Endraal; Appozhudhu Paaraakkum, Avan Pinnaale Padhinaayiramperum, Thaabor Malaiyilirundhu Iranginaargal.
15 karththar Siseraavaiyum Andha Ellaa Radhangalaiyum Senaiyanaiththaiyum Paaraakkukku Munbaagap Pattayakkarukkinaal Kalangadiththaar; Siseraa Radhaththaivittirangik Kaalnadaiyaai Odipponaan.
16 paaraak Radhangalaiyum Senaiyaiyum Purajaadhigaludaiya Arosedhmattum Thuraththinaan; Siseraavin Senaiyellaam Pattayakkarukkinaal Vizhundhadhu; Oruvanum MeedhiyaayirukkavillaiÂ .

17 siseraa Kaalnadaiyaaik Keniyanaana Eperin Manaivi Yaageludaiya Koodaaraththirku Odivandhaan; Appozhudhu Yaabeen Ennum Aadhsorin Raajaavukkum, Keniyanaana Eperin Veettukkum Samaadhaanam Undaayirundhadhu.

18 yaagel Veliye Siseraavukku Edhirkondupoi: Ulle Vaarum; En Aandavane, Ennandai Ulle Vaarum, Bayappadaadheyum Endru Avanode Sonnaal; Appadiye Avalandai Koodaaraththil Ulle Vandha Podhu, Avanai Oru Samukkaalaththinaale Moodinaal.
19 avan Avalaip Paarththu: Kudikka Enakkuk Konjam Thanneer Thaa, Thaagamaayirukkiren Endraan; Aval Paal Thuruththiyaith Thirandhu, Avanukkuk Kudikkakkoduththu, Thirumbavum Avanai Moodinaal.
20 appozhudhu Avan: Nee Koodaaravaasalile Nindru, Yaaraavadhu Oruvan Vandhu, Inge Yaaraagilum Irukkiraargalaa Endru Unnidaththil Kettaal, Illai Endru Sol Endraan.

21 pinbu Eperin Manaiviyaagiya Yaagel Oru Koodaara Aaniyai Eduththu, Than Kaiyile Suththiyaip Pidiththuk Kondu, Mella Avanandaiyil Vandhu, Avan Netriyile Andha Aaniyai Adiththuppottaal; Adhu Uruvippoi, Tharaiyile Pudhaindhadhu; Appozhudhu Aayaasamaaith Thoongina Avan Seththupponaan.

22 pinbu Siseraavaith Thodarugira Paaraak Vandhaan; Appozhudhu Yaagel Veliye Avanukku Edhirkondupoi: Vaarum, Neer Thedugira Manushanai Umakkuk Kaanbippen Endru Sonnaal; Avan Avalidaththirku Vandhapodhu, Idho, Siseraa Seththukkidandhaan; Aani Avan Netriyil Adiththirundhadhu.
23 ippadi Dhevan Annaalile Kaanaaniyarin Raajaavaagiya Yaabeenai Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaagath Thaazhththinaar.
24 isravel Puththirarin Kai Kaanaaniyarin Raajaavaagiya Yaabeenai Nirmoolamaakkumattum Avan Mel Balaththuk Kondeyirundhadhu.
